environmentalAdvantages: Located within the suitable 32°N-32°S tropical zone
Hot, humid climate ideal for papaya growth
Annual rainfall of 1,200-1,400mm with good drainage potential

painRelievers: Advanced extraction technology ensures consistent enzyme quality
Pharmaceutical-grade certification meets strict industry standards

gainCreators: Integrated supply chain from local papaya cultivation
Competitive cost structure through vertical integration

painRelievers: Reliable supply chain reduces market volatility

summary.marketPosition: Vertically integrated papain value chain spanning cultivation, processing, and distribution across the Western Hemisphere
